title: Splunk Infrastructure Engineer, Enterprise Technology Services
summary: At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Imagine what you could do at Apple! We’re looking for a hands-on Splunk engineer who brings new innovative ideas to the table to solve tough problems! Come to Apple and help build solutions operating Splunk Services at enormous scale. Our services enable many teams across the company to deliver products and services to Apple customers.
description: Join the Splunk Infrastructure team and help manage and grow our huge fleet of Splunk Enterprise systems. Take on responsibilities to adapt architecture design, deployment models and the technology stack for our growing fleet. Ensure maximum service availability and performance. Apply your expertise in capacity planning to ensure we never run out of resources. Help deploy our services across an ever growing fleet of servers. Automate maintenance and monitoring tasks. Ensure an updated platform free of vulnerabilities. Keep applications current and ensure compatibility with the rest of the fleet. Explore and adapt to new deployment platforms. Resolve technical Splunk issues. Collaborate with various other application teams to lead and deliver exclusive products in an exciting dynamic environment.
preferred_qualifications: In-depth knowledge on Splunk search processing language (SPL) and visualization. Hands-on experience using automation tools (Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Terraform, etc.) to manage application deployments at scale. Working knowledge of scripting languages like Python and Shell Scripting.
